trans-unit.source: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> 컨트롤의 행 사이 또는 열 사이에 간격을 다시 배분하는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control redistributes space between rows or columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, without changing the dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 컨트롤의 행 또는 열에 대 한 간격을 재배포는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>의 크기를 변경 하지 않고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> resizes two columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of one column is increased while at the same time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of the other column is decreased by the same amount.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어,는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 두 열 크기를 조정는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> 한 열의 속성을 동시에 있는 동안 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> 다른 열의 속성을 같은 크기 만큼 감소 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties and by leaving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 가로 또는 세로 정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 설정 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> 속성 상태로 유지 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> 속성이 해당 기본값으로 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: **How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls**
trans-unit.target: **세로 및 가로 GridSplitter 컨트롤을 만드는 방법**

trans-unit.source: GridSplitter type
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> value
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value
Resizes rows
<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>
Resizes columns
<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>
If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the columns.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> 보다 크거나 같으면 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>,이 열의 크기를 조정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the rows.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> 는 보다 작은 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>,이 행의 크기를 조정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 행 이나 다른 콘텐츠를 포함 하는 열은 겹칠 수 또는 행 또는 열을 단독으로 차지할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).
trans-unit.target: 정의 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>, 참조 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 행 크기를 조정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) 및 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 열 크기를 조정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property settings do not achieve the desired <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> behavior, you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> 속성 설정이 원하는 얻을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 동작을 변경할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> 속성 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 에 포함 된 다른 개체에 의해 가려질 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> 의 컬렉션은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible.md).
trans-unit.target: 이러한 상황을 방지 하는 방법에 대 한 정보를 참조 하십시오. [하는 방법: GridSplitter Visible 임을 확인](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> by overlaying the edge of a column.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 의 열 크기를 조정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> 열 가장자리를 겹쳐 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> and that occupies a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 의 열 크기를 조정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> 의 열을 차지 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> class.
Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> 컨트롤을 사용하여 행이나 열의 크기를 조정하기 위해 마우스를 끌어야 하는 최소 거리를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 행이나 열의 크기를 조정하기 위해 마우스로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />를 끌어야 하는 최소 거리를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
The minimum distance that is defined by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 정의 된 최소 거리 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> 사용자가 마우스를 끌 때 지속적으로 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> amount, the rows or columns are resized.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 끌면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 으로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> 양, 행 또는 열 크기가 조정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> the same amount.
trans-unit.target: 행 및 열을 자세한 크기를 조정 하려면 끌어야는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> are made in multiples of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 마우스나 키보드를 사용 하 여 이동 하 여 적용 된 열 및 행 크기를 변경 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 의 배수 만큼 변경 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the distance that each press of an arrow key moves a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 화살표 키를 누를 때마다 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> 컨트롤이 이동하는 거리를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The distance that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> moves for each press of an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: 화살표 키를 누를 때마다 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />가 이동하는 거리입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement" /> dependency property.
Creates the implementation of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Called when a key is pressed.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Called when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> 컨트롤이 키보드 포커스를 잃을 때 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.
Responds to a change in the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control determines what type of pointer to display after its <xref:System.Windows.Size> is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 컨트롤이 결정 한 후 표시 하는 포인터 형식을 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Size> 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control preview indicator that is displayed when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> 속성이 <see langword="true" />로 설정된 경우 표시되는 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" /> 컨트롤 미리 보기 표시기의 모양, 효과 또는 기타 스타일 특성을 사용자 지정하는 스타일을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> dimensions as you move the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> 컨트롤을 이동할 때 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Grid" /> 크기의 변경 가능성을 보여 주는 미리 보기 표시기의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.
When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 스타일을 설정 하는 경우 몇 가지 제한 사항이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).
XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: 요청 되는 스타일을 식별 하는 키입니다.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 속성 요소 구문은 지원 되지만 권장 하지는 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 바인딩 참조 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> 가능 하지만 일반적이 지 않은 이기도 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None

A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 행 또는 열 경계에 대 한 변경의 미리 보기 사용자 끄는 동안 표시 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 컨트롤 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> 속성이로 설정 된 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 열과 행 테두리는 사용자가 마우스 단추를 놓을 때 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control is defined.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> 컨트롤이 정의된 열 또는 행에 상대적으로 크기가 조정되는 열 또는 행을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> 컨트롤에 의해 크기가 조정되는 열 또는 행을 나타내는 열거형 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior.BasedOnAlignment" />.

To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 설정, 행 또는 열 크기를 조정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 원하는 동작을 얻을 수 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> 속성을 변경는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> 기본값입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 행 크기를 조정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) 및 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 열 크기를 조정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control resizes rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> 컨트롤이 행 또는 열의 크기를 조정하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: 행 또는 열의 크기를 조정할지 여부를 지정하는 열거형 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection.Auto" />.

To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 설정, 행 또는 열 크기를 조정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 원하는 동작을 얻을 수 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> 속성을 변경는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> 기본값입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 행 크기를 조정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) 및 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 열 크기를 조정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> 컨트롤을 끌 때 이 컨트롤이 열 또는 행 크기를 업데이트하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> preview is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> 미리 보기가 표시되면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requires an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 필요는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> 개체 끌기 미리 보기 피드백을 표시 하기 위해 해당 부모 트리에 있어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is typically met by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is available in the default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> or in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is created by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 요구 사항을 충족 일반적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> 에 대 한 기본 스타일에서 사용할 수 있는 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Window> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> 하 여 만든 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: However, if neither of these is available, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control must define its own <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 둘 다 이러한 경우를 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 컨트롤을 정의 해야 자체 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> 속성이 `true`, 행 또는 열 크기의 변경 내용을 확인의 미리 보기가 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual size changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> is released.
trans-unit.target: 실제 크기를 변경할 때의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 해제 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: 속성이로 설정 된 경우 `false`, 열 또는 행 크기가 사용자 끌기도 실시간으로 업데이트 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard is used to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 키보드를 사용 하 여에 이동 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> 컨트롤, 열 또는 행 크기가 경우에도 실시간으로 업데이트 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> 속성이 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview" /> dependency property.
